reviewText: hi I got this item and I am happy with it thanks again
Poor acting. poor plot, this is a dvd I urge every one to stay clear of, waste of time and money
I thought I had goten a movie with Fran Drescher, you know the Nanny Series.  Anyway, I really didn't like this movie.  It was too late to get my money back.

A friend bought this movie for me for the holidays and it is adorable and fun! I am a mother of two young adult children and we all loved it! I am so happy to see that movies like these are being made again. It has been years since the whole family could enjoy the same movie!

this movie is hysterical! i saw it in theaters and i highly recommend you buy it if you love comedies! the storyline is hysterical and you may laugh yourself to tears!
so funny!! totally recommend it for everyone out there!!
